sobre.descricao1: I am Wallace Santana, a FullStack Developer with a constant passion for learning and evolving. I adopt a self-taught approach, always seeking new ways to enhance my technical skills and personal growth. I believe that excellence goes beyond code and reflects in all areas of life.
sobre.descricao2: I have two major professional dreams: the first is to work abroad, expanding my horizons; the second is to become a reference in technology, positively influencing the sector and contributing to innovation.

storybook.integracao_com_react_vue_e_angular: Integration with React, Vue, and Angular

vite.configuracao_e_uso_de_vite_para_desenvol: Vite Configuration and Usage for Development
vite.uso_de_vite_com_react_e_vue: Using Vite with React and Vue
vite.integracao_com_ferramentas_como_tailwind: Integration with Tools like Tailwind and Prettier

tailwind_css.integracao_com_outras_ferramentas_como_r: Integration with Tools like React and Next.js

swagger.suporte_a_autenticacao_e_seguranca_na_do: Support for Authentication and Security in Documentation

critix.name: Critix
critix.description: Critix is a platform for movie and TV series ratings. The frontend was developed with React and consumes the backend API to provide a dynamic and interactive experience for users.

javascript_notes.name: JavaScript Notes
javascript_notes.description: JavaScript Notes is a web application that allows users to create and manage personal notes. Each user can create an account, and their notes are kept private and accessible only by them. The application is built with React and uses Bulma for styling.

wydenai.name: WydenAI
wydenai.description: An interactive chat project developed to connect university students and facilitate learning.

gastrovibe.name: GastroVibe
gastrovibe.description: A site showcasing the best gastronomy in Salvador.

focalpoint.name: FocalPoint
focalpoint.description: FocalPoint is a to-do list application.

gym_lending_page.name: Gym Lending Page
gym_lending_page.description: This project was created to provide an interactive and visually appealing experience for users, using animations and dynamic sliders.

projeto_calendário_semanal.name: Weekly Calendar Project
projeto_calendário_semanal.description: A project for a content calendar system where content is displayed based on the day the user clicks, with a side menu. The site is made responsive using Media Query.

site_sobre_musica_classica.name: Classical Music Website
site_sobre_musica_classica.description: This project is a tribute to the rich history of classical music, showcasing notable composers and their most important works. The site offers an overview of iconic composers, curiosities about their lives and compositions, and a section dedicated to listening to their music.

site_de_mangas_de_animes.name: Anime Manga Website
site_de_mangas_de_animes.description: A project for a content calendar system where content is displayed based on the day the user clicks, with a side menu. The site is made responsive using Media Query.

desenvolvimento_aplicacoes_web.name: Web Application Development
desenvolvimento_aplicacoes_web.description: Creation of modern and responsive web applications.
desenvolvimento_aplicacoes_web.details: Uses technologies such as React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

desenvolvimento_apis_rest.name: REST API Development
desenvolvimento_apis_rest.description: Creation of scalable and secure APIs.
desenvolvimento_apis_rest.details: Uses Node.js, Express, Spring Boot, and JWT authentication.

desenvolvimento_frontend.name: Frontend Development
desenvolvimento_frontend.description: Implementation of dynamic and interactive user interfaces.
desenvolvimento_frontend.details: Specialist in React, Tailwind, and animations with Framer Motion.

desenvolvimento_backend.name: Backend Development
desenvolvimento_backend.description: Creation of robust and high-performance servers.
desenvolvimento_backend.details: Works with SQL and NoSQL databases, as well as microservices.

integracao_apis_terceiros.name: Third-Party API Integration
integracao_apis_terceiros.description: Connection with services like TMDb and Stripe.
integracao_apis_terceiros.details: Uses Axios, GraphQL, and optimizes requests.

documentacao_projetos.name: Project Documentation
documentacao_projetos.details: Uses Swagger, Postman, and Notion for documentation.

bootcamp_fullstack_sysmap.name: Bootcamp FullStack Sysmap
bootcamp_fullstack_sysmap.description: Advanced FullStack Bootcamp covering microservices, security, and cloud development.

bootcamp_fullstack_maisprati.name: Bootcamp FullStack MaisPraTi
bootcamp_fullstack_maisprati.description: Intensive FullStack training focused on React, Spring Boot, and SQL databases.

análise_e_desenvolvimento_de_sistemas.name: Analysis and Development of Systems
análise_e_desenvolvimento_de_sistemas.description: Higher education course focused on system development, databases, and software engineering.

técnico_em_informática.name: Technical in Computing
técnico_em_informática.description: Technical course focused on software development, computer maintenance, and networks.
